quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Search for playlists on the homepage
quickStart.step2: Select desired songs in the playlist details
quickStart.step3: Click 'Download' and wait for ZIP packaging to complete

notes.title: Notes
notes.item1: For educational purposes only, commercial use and copyright infringement are prohibited
notes.item2: VIP songs will only download preview version by default

faq.a1: Search for playlists, select the songs you want, click the download button, and the browser will package them into a ZIP file locally and save automatically.
faq.q2: Can I download the full version of VIP songs?
faq.a2: Without VIP login, only preview versions can be downloaded; free songs can be downloaded in full version.

quality.title: Audio Quality Guide
quality.description: Learn the differences between audio quality formats

formats.mp3: MP3 - Common lossy compression format, 320kbps for high quality
formats.flac: FLAC - Lossless compression format, perfect audio quality
formats.ape: APE - Lossless compression format with higher compression ratio
formats.wav: WAV - Uncompressed original format, larger file size
